visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render an areaspline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: areaspline, Chart title: 'Sample Areaspline Chart', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark theme with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Three series with the provided data, Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green for the fill color, Additional configurations: Set chart margins to 50px, add a legend at the bottom, and use a dark background.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render an areaspline chart with a dark theme. The chart title is set to 'Sample Areaspline Chart' with white text and a font size of 18px. The axes labels and titles are styled with white text to contrast with the dark background. The data series include three sets of data, each with a unique name and specific data points. The areaspline series are stacked normally, with a fill opacity of 0.3 and null values connected to maintain continuity. The fill color for the series is a gradient from blue to green, enhancing the visual appeal. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50px on all sides, positioning the legend at the bottom center, and using a dark background color for the chart area.
